channel.title: Is There a god and is it a man or woman?
channel.description:
What do you guys think is there a god? And if u think so is it a man or a woman or a weird lookin freak lollol
Well i dont think there is a god myself, but if there is has to be a man lol

item.title: Is There a god and is it a man or woman?
item.dc:creator: @zoss0 Zoss
item.description:
@zoss0 wrote:

[quote=“dannytuite, post:1, topic:37541”]What do you guys think is there a god?
And if u think so is it a man or a woman or a weird lookin freak lollol

Well i dont think there is a god myself, but if there is has to be a man lol[/quote]
I’m a christian, so i’ll say what i know.
Yes there is a God, he’s helped me in ways, also some i don’t know.
God is neither Man or Woman, he made them.

Try reading the Bible or go to church to find out more. My faith isn’t that strong.

item.title: Is There a god and is it a man or woman?
item.dc:creator: @kemico2 kemico2
item.description:
@kemico2 wrote:

Well I think he is a man for many reasons.
1)We call him “father” and arnt fathers men
2)Nuns belive that if they die virgens than they will have sex with him. Yes freaky i know.
3)Ok dammit i aint got no more reasons.

Oh and for everyones theory most of us are a bunch of gamer kids that are talking about god. And i bet half of you that said you dont belive in god are just doing that for attentionl. But if pretty much everyone has a differeny theory about god do you think you are really right? I do not like talking about this because this starts arguments. So when people start talking about god and whatever their ideas is I just try to stay out of it.

Read full topic

item.title: Is There a god and is it a man or woman?
item.dc:creator: @Gotta_Catch_Them_All Gotta Catch Them All
item.description:
@Gotta_Catch_Them_All wrote:

[quote=“O M F G, post:69, topic:37541”][quote author=Gotta Catch Them All link=topic=53158.msg754136#msg754136 date=1168382143]
God is real. God is a male. He is sometimes called Gotta Catch Them All and he is one sexy devil (pun not intended.).
[/quote]
Your a dweeb…Not for believing in god,but for that lame “joke”…In any case…Show me god, prove it’s god- I’ll believe in god. If it did exist though, I’d want it to be female…I think most of you guys here know why…[/quote]

That not fair on the gay people God created.

[quote=“IcyPimp, post:70, topic:37541”][quote author=O M F G link=topic=53158.msg755522#msg755522 date=1168407596]

God is real. God is a male. He is sometimes called Gotta Catch Them All and he is one sexy devil (pun not intended.).

Your a dweeb…Not for believing in god,but for that lame “joke”…In any case…Show me god, prove it’s god- I’ll believe in god. If it did exist though, I’d want it to be female…I think most of you guys here know why…
[/quote]

Who says dweeb?[/quote]

Read full topic
